meanings.definition: The condition of being abnormally large in size.
meanings.sent1: Her giantism made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the baby with giantism due to his rapid growth.
meanings.sent3: The giantism of the pumpkin at the fair amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: In the land of toys, the teddy bear's giantism overshadowed all others.
meanings.sent5: The giantism of the mountain was breathtaking as we approached it.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being a giant.
meanings.sent1: The fairy tale highlighted the giantism of the character.
meanings.sent2: Legends often speak of the giantism of mythical creatures.
meanings.sent3: The giantism of the cake at the party was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: His giantism in kindness was unmatched by anyone in the village.
meanings.sent5: The giantism of the tree in the forest was a sight to behold.
